description:
Traveling by coach to Axel, Megumin and Yunyun`s peaceful journey is interrupted by a string of suspicious monster attacks.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Destroyer from the Crimson Demon Village
Kouma no Sato kara no Destroyer
La destructrice du village de l`Écarlate
紅魔の里からの来訪者[デストロイヤー]
